string-array.name: data_desc
string-array.item: I have been listening to her songs since I was around 10 years old, during my elementary school days! I used to really like "Red" and "22", but now I think my favorites are "The Way I Loved You," "You Belong with Me," and "Enchanted."
I have known her since we were 13. She was covering Ed Sheeran(s) song "Perfect," and I immediately fell in love with her voice. Because we are the same age, thatms when I started idolizing her.

I have idolized him ever since he released his song "Love in My Pocket." He is Indonesian but based in the USA under the 88rising label. I knew about him before, but after "Love in My Pocket," I started following him closely. I even learned English because of him!

Of coure, when I started senior high school, two songs by Nadin Amizah became popular, and surprisingly, I loved them even though her music genre usually does not fit my taste! Until now, I still love her and her song "Star" the most.

I have really loved her since I found a singing video of her covering the song "I Love You, You'll Know It." Her voice is so unique and calming! And then I discovered her song "Lugu," and now I am a big fan of her music!
EXO is definitely the boy group with the most stable voices! I adore them! My favorite song is "Walk on Memories"! My bias is Baekhyun and Chanyeol! I love their jokes and how fun they are.

NCT DREAM is the cutest group on this list! I love them because I discovered their song "We Go Up" and immediately became a fan of Nana with his pink hair! The songs I love the most from them are "Life is Still Going On" and "Beautiful Time."

The first time I saw her was on TikTok with her amazing song "Lose." I started following her and was surprised to find out she is under the 88rising label just like Rich Brian. I still love her song "La La Lost You"!

I have been listening to his songs since elementary school! I used to sing his songs all the time and enjoyed his voice so much! I loved the song "Sepatu" back then, and nowadays, I am obsessed with "Interaksi."

I fell in love with his song "Waktu yang Salah"! Everyone knows that song. I started following him and discovered that he is a writer, songwriter, and singer! So fascinating. And I still love the song "Waktu yang Salah" to this day.

string-array.name: song_name
string-array.item: If you could see me cryin\' in my room

string-array.name: song_desc
string-array.item: A high-energy K-pop anthem that captures the exhilarating feeling of chasing dreams and reaching for the stars, with catchy hooks and dynamic beats.

A powerful and intense track that showcases EXO\'s versatility and charisma, exploring themes of inner conflict and embracing one\'s darker side with a blend of haunting melodies and commanding vocals.
IAn electrifying pop anthem that exudes confidence and energy, encouraging listeners to find their inner strength and overcome obstacles with its addictive chorus and uplifting lyrics.
A soulful and introspective song that delves into themes of heartbreak and vulnerability, with poignant lyrics and a heartfelt vocal delivery that resonate with raw emotion.
A tender and heartfelt ballad that captures the essence of falling deeply in love, with Taylor Swift\'s signature storytelling and emotional depth shining through every heartfelt lyric and melody.
A vibrant and passionate track that explores the tumultuous emotions of a passionate love affair, with vivid imagery and a dynamic blend of country and pop influences.
A fun and carefree anthem celebrating the joys of youth and friendship, with infectious melodies and relatable lyrics that capture the excitement and freedom of being twenty-two.

A heartfelt and intimate song that reflects on the complexities of life and relationships, with Rich Brian\'s introspective lyrics and melodic delivery creating a poignant and emotive listening experience.
A soulful and melancholic track that explores the pain of heartbreak and loss, with NIKI\'s emotive vocals and atmospheric production evoking a sense of longing and nostalgia.
A smooth and sultry R&B track that oozes with confidence and allure, showcasing NIKI\'s seductive vocals and slick production while exploring themes of desire and attraction.
